Name: Toasted Coconut Mocha
Description: A gentle mixture of chocolate and coconut flavors. The aroma is heavenly.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una mezcla suave de chocolate y coco. El aroma es celestial.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 초콜릿과 코코넛의 부드러운 혼합. 향이 천국같아요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine sanfte Mischung aus Schokoladen- und Kokosaromen. Das Aroma ist himmlisch.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A csokoládé és a kókusz kellemes keveréke. Az íze mennyei.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: チョコとココナッツの優雅な風味。天にも昇る香り。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma mistura suave de chocolate e coco. Seu aroma é celestial.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Нежная смесь вкусов шоколада и кокоса. Райский вкус.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 巧克力和椰子的味道在杯中糅合氤氲。闻之令人愉悦。
